name: Magnets And Jellies
description:
Great Ham Jam 2016 entry from Team Hyrule

It's a little buggy at the moment but stay tuned for updates!

A simple puzzle game - find 5 potions to win. You'll need to move some blocks to proceed through some areas; press the 'K' key to switch the polarity of your magnet gun. Not all blocks can be moved though!

https://itch.io/jam/the-great-ham-jam
